hadiths.text: Narrated Um Salama:One night the Prophet (ﷺ) woke up, saying, "None has the right to be worshipped but Allah! How many afflictions have been sent down tonight, and how many treasures have been sent down (disclosed)! Who will go and wake up (for prayers) the lady dwellers of these rooms? Many well dressed soul (people) in this world, will be naked on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَتَجَوَّزُ مِنَ اللِّبَاسِ وَالْبُسْطِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to be contented with whatever clothes or mats were available
